Git, Pathogen, and _vimrc

VIM Adventure Day 2

I won't lie I've struggled a bit with simply the installation, thus the headaches. A couple of tutorials I found online were very useful, the following proved invaluable.

  • Installing Vim for Windows
  • Vim for Windows Youtube Videos
  • VIM Adventures Games(Awesome)

The headaches came in when I began to read the GitHub repositories that contained plug-ins I wanted, the most basic of which is a different colorscheme. All repositories mentioned Pathogen and Bundle, as well as Git(which I didn't know was separate from GitHub).

So I began my search and downloaded the appropriate files, all found on www.vim.org. A couple of installs, corrupted files, un-installs and successful re-installs later, I now finally have VIM working. Soon I'll post a thorough step-by-step install.

Thanks for reading!
